mapper.select: select * from notice order by n_num desc
select * from notice where n_title like '%'||#{nTitle}||'%' order by n_num desc
select * from notice where n_category=#{nCategory} order by n_num desc
select n_num_pre, n_title_pre from (select n_num, n_title, lag(n_num,1) over(order by n_num) as n_num_pre, lag(n_title,1) over(order by n_num) as n_title_pre from notice ) where n_num=#{nNum}
select n_num_next, n_title_next from (select n_num, n_title, lead(n_num,1) over(order by n_num) as n_num_next, lead(n_title,1) over(order by n_num) as n_title_next from notice ) where n_num=#{nNum}
